summary: The ruthless, moneyed Hubbard clan lives in, and poisons, their part of the deep South at the turn of the twentieth century.
cast: Bette Davis|Herbert Marshall|Teresa Wright|Richard Carlson|Dan Duryea|Patricia Collinge|Charles Dingle|Carl Benton Reid|Jessica Grayson|John Marriott|Russell Hicks|Lucien Littlefield|Virginia Brissac|Terry Nibert|Henry 'Hot Shot' Thomas|Charles R. Moore|Hooper Atchley|Al Bridge|Morgan Brown|Tex Driscoll|Jesse Graves|Lew Kelly|Henry Roquemore|Libby Taylor|Kenny Washington|Hank Worden
title: La loba
